data.name: RESEARCH and DESTROY - Danganronpa 2 Costume Pack
data.detailed_description:
Take on the horde of Supernaturals in style with this Danganronpa 2 costume pack.

Contains the following costumes:
- Nagito Komaeda costume for Larry
- Chiaki Nanami costume for Marie
- Monokuma costume for Gary
data.about_the_game:
Take on the horde of Supernaturals in style with this Danganronpa 2 costume pack.

Contains the following costumes:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4771 CPU @ 3.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 770 4GB
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
